alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 31 at 11:17PM CDT until April 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TO 9 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CIMARRON COUNTY... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 3. * Timing...4 PM through 9 PM.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
